projects.title: Sverige Radio Player
projects.description: A searchable radio player using channels from the Sverige Radio's API. The search function lets you filter through the channels and find your favourite station to play. The page itself is responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.
projects.shortDescription: A searchable radio player built in React using Sveriges Radio's API to fetch and play your favourite radio channel.

projects.title: Food Blog
projects.description: New online newspaper made for Bonnier News using Vanilla Javascript, HTML, and CSS, along with the Google News API. We were tasked with developing a new lifestyle site and we chose a food theme. You are able to filter through food catagories and load more articles if you want to see more.
projects.shortDescription: Designed a new online lifestyle site using Javascript, HTML, CSS and Google's News API for Bonnier News

projects.title: Jobs Site
projects.description: We developed a multipage career site for our partner Comprend using their recruitment API.
projects.shortDescription: An new multi page job site built in React using their internal recruitment API for client Comprend

projects.title: Time Zone Clock
projects.description: A world timezone clock built with React and using moment.js. You are able to compare the time in Stockholm to other countries in the world.
projects.shortDescription: A timezone comparison clock built with Javascript and React and using moment.js to compare time in countries around the world

projects.title: Location App
projects.description: Got sick of forgetting where I parked my car so I built this app which lets you find and store locations so you can come back to them later. This multi-screen app (using advanced segues and navigation contol) is built with Swift for iOS, it makes use of geolocation and permenant storage.
projects.shortDescription: An Swift location based app that uses local storage to enables you to put pins in memorable location and return later to find them

projects.title: Swift To-Do App
projects.description: An iOS to-do list built with Swift. This multi-screen app (using advanced segues and permentant storage) enables you to create, store and delete messages and reminders for the future.
projects.shortDescription: An iOS to-do list built with Swift. This multi-screen app (using advanced segues and permentant storage) enables you to create, store and delete messages and reminders for the future.
